class.name: LinearSolverQrpHouseCol

javadoc.text: * Performs a pseudo inverse solver using the {@link QRColPivDecompositionHouseholderColumn} decomposition * directly. For details on how the pseudo inverse is computed see {@link BaseLinearSolverQrp}. *
javadoc.author: Peter Abeles

method.name: solve
method.comment: get the pivots and transpose them
solve each column one by one
make a copy of this column in the vector
solve for Rx = b using the standard upper triangular solver
finish the basic solution by filling in zeros
